entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to periods of snow and ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
